/** * Implements an HTML-specific element, an {@link org.w3c.dom.Element} that * will only appear inside HTML documents. This element extends {@link * org.apache.xerces.dom.ElementImpl} by adding methods for directly * manipulating HTML-specific attributes. All HTML elements gain access to * the id, title, lang, * dir and class attributes. Other elements * add their own specific attributes. * * @xerces.internal * * @version $Revision: 1.9 $ $Date: 2005/04/18 00:41:07 $ * @author Assaf Arkin * @see org.w3c.dom.html.HTMLElement */
